text: Man of Iron () is a 1981 Polish drama movie directed by Andrzej Wajda and stars Jerzy Radziwiłowicz, Krystyna Janda, Marian Opania, Wiesława Kosmalska, Bogusław Linda, Andrzej Seweryn, Marek Kondrat, Lech Wałęsa. It was distributed by United Artists and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1982. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 drama movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Andrzej Wajda Category:Movies set in Poland Category:Movies set in the 1980s
title: Man of Iron
